data.text:
Cine-Nyms is a Round 1 game in Richard Osman's House of Games. It was first played in Episode 7 and last played in Episode 65.

Rules[]

Each contestant in turn is shown a film quote, with all of the content words replaced with synonyms, followed by the year of release of the film the quote is from. The contestant must name the film the quote is from. If successful, the contestant scores a point; otherwise, the other contestants can attempt to buzz in for a steal.

Recap style[]

In episode articles, playings of Cine-Nyms are formatted as follows.

In this example, in the first question, the first contestant gave the correct answer. In the second question, the second contestant timed out, then the first contestant buzzed in with an incorrect answer, then the fourth contestant buzzed in with the correct answer.

Questions and Answers Q# Quote Year Answer 1 "Quote 1"

("Original 1") Year 1 Answer 1 2 "Quote 2"

("Original 2") Year 2 Answer 2

Contestant Responses Q# Contestant 1 Contestant 2 Contestant 3 Contestant 4 1 Answer 1 2 (1) Answer 3 [timed out] (2) Answer 2
